tool_description: Manages inventory levels and availability tracking for reward items including stock quantities, replenishment alerts, and availability status updates.

item_id.description: Unique identifier of the reward item to track inventory for

initial_stock.description: Initial stock quantity (0 or positive integer)

unlimited_stock.description: Whether this item has unlimited availability

low_stock_threshold.description: Stock level that triggers low inventory alerts

auto_replenish.description: Enable automatic replenishment when stock is low

replenish_quantity.description: Quantity to order for automatic replenishment

error_messages: Invalid item_id: Reward item must exist before setting up inventory tracking.
Invalid initial_stock: Must be 0 or a positive integer.
Invalid low_stock_threshold: Must be a positive integer less than initial_stock.
Invalid replenish_quantity: Required when auto_replenish is true, must be a positive integer.
Conflicting configuration: Cannot set low_stock_threshold or auto_replenish when unlimited_stock is true.
usage: Provide item_id and initial_stock as required parameters. Set unlimited_stock to true for digital items or experiences with no quantity limits. Configure low_stock_threshold and auto_replenish settings for physical products requiring inventory management.

inventory_id.description: Unique identifier for the inventory tracking record

availability_status.description: Current availability status (available, low_stock, out_of_stock, unlimited)

tracking_status.description: Status of inventory tracking setup (active, inactive)
